biotools.summary: A secure framework for performing multi-site genetic association studies across large consortia, without violating privacy/confidentiality of individual participants or substudy sites. It aims at addressing various attacks on genomic privacy, and provides comprehensive protection over genomic data without impeding scientific endeavor.

bioschemas.name: SecureMA
